bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum alloy race frame, "Hemi" monocoque top tube, manipulated 44mm DT, forged 68mm Euro BB shell, triple void extrusion chainstay/BB yoke, forged/relieved D.O., integrated chain tensioner.

components.description: Specialized 100% Cr-Mo, 1-1/8" CNC'd 1pc steer tube, 1-1/4" blades
"SX-1C" threadless 1-1/8" Cr-Mo cups
Specialized "Asym" race stem, forged alloy, front-load, 55mm reach
Specialized 100% Cr-Mo 2-piece, 125mm rise, 620mm width, 9 deg back sweep x 3 deg up sweep
Specialized Kraton, flanged dual compound, 130mm
Shimano BR-M420-L, cold forged "V" brake w/ stainless hardware & pipe
Shimano BL-M510-L, cold forged (RH only)
Shimano SFMX-30, 1/2x3/32"x18T
KMC Z610HX
TruVativ "Holzfeller" 175mm, forged 7050 alloy, ISIS, 5-arm 110mm
41t 7075 alloy
TruVativ Hussafelt, ISIS spline, 68x 113mm, sealed cartridge bearing
Specialized magnesium platform, 9/16" Cr-Mo axle, sealed cartridge bearing, removable screw in pins
Rhyno Lite XL-TCB, 24", welded seam, double wall, CNC'd braking surface, eyelets
Specialized "Wide Load", 36 hole for aero spoke, sealed cartridge bearing, machined alloy dust caps, 3/8" Cr-Mo axle
Specialized alloy "Flip-Flop" right and left side M30 F/W thread, 36 hole, 3/8" Cro-Mo axle, sealed cartridge bearing,
14g stainless steel aero blade w/brass nipples (Front: L241/R241mm Rear: L241/R241mm)
Specialized AA-Main, 24" x 1.75"
Specialized AA-Main, 24" x 1.75"
Specialized light, Schraeder
Specialized racing w/7mm rails
Specialized alloy micro adjust, 30.9mm/300mm, for 7mm rails
Specialized forged and CNC'd single bolt design, 35.2/33.3mm
Specialized alloy fork cap w/washer & spacers, forged alloy axle carriers and tensioner hardware, chain guard cover, reflectors, owners manual
